text: Dan Leon Glazer (or Glezer, ; born 20 September 1996) is an Israeli footballer who plays as a midfielder for Maccabi Tel Aviv and the Israel national team. ==Early life== Glazer was born in Tel Aviv-Jaffa, Israel, to an Ashkenazi Jewish family. ==International career== Glazer made his international debut for Israel on 11 September 2018, coming on as a substitute in the 74th minute for Moanes Dabour during the friendly match against Northern Ireland, which finished as a 0–3 away loss. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !colspan=3|Israel |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2018||2||0 |- |2019||5||0 |- !Total!!7!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * * * Dan Glazer at football.org.il Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Israeli Jews Category:Israeli footballers Category:Maccabi Tel Aviv F.C. players Category:Beitar Tel Aviv Bat Yam F.C. players Category:Maccabi Netanya F.C. players Category:Football players from Tel Aviv Category:Liga Leumit players Category:Israeli Premier League players Category:Israel international footballers Category:Israel under-21 international footballers Category:Israel youth international footballers Category:Association football midfielders
